name: OpenOptionsAutoCAD

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: globalScaleOption
properties.description: How to scale the AutoCAD drawing on import (default: Fit Artboard)

properties.name: globalScalePercent
properties.description: Percentage scaling to apply globally on the AutoCAD drawing (default: 1.0)

properties.name: unitScaleRatio
properties.description: Ratio by which to scale while mapping the units (default: 1.0)

properties.name: unit
properties.description: Units to which to map (default: Millimeters)

properties.name: selectedLayoutName
properties.description: Name of layout in the AutoCAD drawing to import.

properties.name: centerArtwork
properties.description: To center the created artwork on the artboard (default: true)

properties.name: mergeLayers
properties.description: To merge the layers of the artwork (default: false)

properties.name: scaleLineweights
properties.description: To scale lineweights by the same amount as rest of the drawing (default: false)

description: Options which may be supplied when opening a AutoCAD file.
